```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(ggimage)
library(nflfastR)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
options(scipen = 9999)
```

```{r}
data <- load_pbp(2021)
```


```{r}
 data %>%
  filter(posteam == "KC", rush == 1 ) %>%
  group_by(rusher) %>%
  summarise(plays = n(), mean_epa = round(mean(epa),3), total_epa = round(sum(epa),1), mean_yards = round(mean(yards_gained),1), series_success = round(mean(series_success),2), .groups = "drop") %>%
  arrange(-plays) %>%
  filter(plays > 20) %>%
  gt() %>%
    tab_header(title = "2021 KC Rushers usage and efficiency") %>% 
  gt_theme_espn() 




```

```{r}
 data %>%
  filter(posteam == "KC", pass == 1 ) %>%
  group_by(receiver) %>%
  summarise(plays = n(), mean_epa = round(mean(epa),3), total_epa = round(sum(epa),1), mean_yards = round(mean(yards_gained),1), series_success = round(mean(series_success),2), .groups = "drop") %>%
  arrange(-plays) %>%
  filter(plays > 20) %>%
  gt() %>%
  gt_theme_espn() %>%
  tab_header(title = "2021 KC Receivers usage and efficiency")

```



```{r}

 data %>%
  filter(pass == 1, is.na(yards_gained) == FALSE, is.na(epa) == FALSE, season_type == "REG") %>%
  group_by(passer) %>%
  summarise( plays = n(), mean_epa = round(mean(epa),3), mean_yards = round(mean(yards_gained),1), .groups = "drop") %>%
  arrange(-plays) %>%
  filter(plays > 100) %>%
  gt() %>%
  gt_theme_espn() %>%
  tab_header(title = "2021 Regular Season Qbs usage and efficiency")


```
